revised_title: Pepys Annual Commemoration Service and International Congress of Anthropological and Ethnological Sciences
tldr: The article reports on the Pepys Commemoration Service at St Olave's Church and the International Congress of Anthropological and Ethnological Sciences held in Copenhagen. The service honored the unique diarist Samuel Pepys, while the congress brought together over 700 scientists from 45 countries to discuss various topics in anthropology and ethnology. The article also mentions the various exhibits and presentations at the Conversaziones held by the Royal Society.
